patthana8.20:4.1: Nosaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.20:4.2: Nosaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.20:4.3: Nosaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano ca nanosaññojano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.20:5.1: Nanosaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.20:5.2: Nanosaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.20:5.3: Nanosaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano ca nanosaññojano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.20:6.1: Nosaññojanañca nanosaññojanañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.20:6.2: Nosaññojanañca nanosaññojanañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nanosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.20:6.3: Nosaññojanañca nanosaññojanañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano ca nanosaññojano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.20:7.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
